statements: DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE conversion_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE visitor_id = 1234 AND conversion_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM website_traffic);
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE page_id = (SELECT page_id FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_rate < 0.5);
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM conversion_rates WHERE date < '2022-08-01' AND goal_name = 'Registration';
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 1001 AND action = 'login' AND timestamp < '2022-08-05 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_rate < 0.05 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM marketing_analytics WHERE traffic_source = 'Organic' AND conversion_status = false;
DELETE FROM conversion_rates WHERE user_id = 100 AND conversion_value < 50.00;
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click' AND behavior_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
